backlog.title: User Registration
backlog.description: Implement user registration functionality including password hashing, email verification, and error handling. Password hashing to be implemented using bcrypt.

backlog.title: Profile Setup
backlog.description: Create profile setup functionality with multiple form fields, validation rules, and image upload for profile pictures.

backlog.title: Basic Dashboard Layout
backlog.description: Implement the basic dashboard layout with responsive design patterns and initial component architecture using Tailwind CSS. Update wireframes to remove social login options.

backlog.title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
backlog.description: Configure CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions with separate workflows for development, staging, and production environments. Resolve AWS integration permission issues.

backlog.title: Implement JWT Authentication
backlog.description: Implement JWT token authentication with refresh token rotation (sliding window approach), including rate limiting and API key authentication for future third-party integrations. Ensure HIPAA-compliant token storage.

backlog.title: Set up PostgreSQL Database
backlog.description: Set up PostgreSQL database with initial schema structure, including test database setup and connection pooling configuration.

backlog.title: Implement Accessibility Features
backlog.description: Implement ARIA labels and keyboard navigation for accessibility in the profile setup screens and user registration components.

backlog.title: Create Design System Documentation
backlog.description: Create comprehensive design system documentation including component examples and usage guidelines. Ensure consistency with Tailwind configuration.

backlog.title: Set up Testing Frameworks
backlog.description: Set up testing frameworks including Jest, React Testing Library, and Cypress, with coverage thresholds in CI pipeline.

backlog.title: Implement Form Validation Patterns
backlog.description: Develop standardized patterns for form validation and error handling across the application.

backlog.title: Configure Tailwind CSS
backlog.description: Resolve Tailwind CSS setup issues with PostCSS configuration and ensure design system consistency. Implement custom spacing values if needed.

backlog.title: Implement HIPAA-compliant Data Encryption
backlog.description: Research and implement HIPAA-compliant data encryption methods for sensitive user information.

backlog.title: Select and Implement Charting Library
backlog.description: Review and finalize decision on charting library (Chart.js vs D3.js) and begin implementation for dashboard visualizations.
